abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
abilities.description:
The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
* At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
* 3/day each: blur, jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)
* 1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

abilities.name: Rally the Troops.
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the githyanki can magically end the charmed and frightened conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.
